title: Digging deeper into Data Activator in Microsoft Fabric
excerpt: We look deeper at Data Activator in Microsoft Fabric with Will Thompson. He shows us how to work with real time data and also how you can leverage Power Automate from Power Platform to take action.  What is Data Activator? https://learn.microsoft.com/fabric/data-activator/data-activator-introduction
